Class ClientDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.ClientDAO
public class ClientDAO extends Object
DAO class for managing Client entities in the database.

Provides CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for games associated with specific clients. Uses ExceptionMessage to handle database-related errors.

Since:
3.3
Author:
Davitroon

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientDAO

      public ClientDAO(ExceptionMessage exceptionMessage)
      Constructs a new ClientDAO with the specified exception handler.
      Parameters:
      exceptionMessage - the ExceptionMessage instance used to display database errors.
      Since:
      3.3

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      public void addClient(Client client, int userID, Connection connection)
      Inserts a new client into the database.
      Parameters:
      client - the Client object to insert.
      userID - the ID of the user who owns the client profile.
      connection - the active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • queryClient

      public ResultSet queryClient(int clientId, Connection connection)
      Queries the database for a specific client by its ID.
      Parameters:
      clientId - the unique identifier of the client.
      connection - the active database Connection.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the client's information, or null if an error occurs.
      Since:
      3.3

    • queryClients

      public ResultSet queryClients(boolean onlyActive, int currentUser, Connection connection)
      Retrieves a list of clients associated with a given user.
      Parameters:
      onlyActive - if true, only active clients are retrieved.
      currentUser - the ID of the current user whose clients are to be listed.
      connection - the active database Connection.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing all clients matching the criteria, or null if an error occurs.
      Since:
      3.3

    • modifyClient

      public void modifyClient(Client client, Connection connection)
      Updates a client's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      client - the Client object containing updated data.
      connection - the active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • updateClientBalance

      public void updateClientBalance(Client client, Connection connection)
      Updates only the balance of a client in the database.
      Parameters:
      client - the Client whose balance is to be updated.
      connection - the active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • deleteClient

      public void deleteClient(int clientId, Connection connection)
      Deletes a client from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      clientId - the ID of the client to delete.
      connection - the active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3

    • deleteClients

      public void deleteClients(int userId, Connection connection)
      Deletes all clients linked to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose clients will be deleted.
      connection - the active database Connection.
      Since:
      3.3
